StoryBranch
StoryBranch

Represents one storyline in the game.

It is made up of a series of StoryPoints.

Functions
StoryBranch
StoryBranch()

Creates an anonymous, parentless branch.

StoryBranch
StoryBranch(
const std::string &name
)

Creates a named, parentless branch.

Parameters
name
const std::string&

The name of the branch

void AddPoint(
const StoryPoint &point
)
Parameters
point
const StoryPoint&

The StoryPoint to add

AddPoint
void AddPoint(
const std::string &name,
const std::string &text,
TextParser *parser,
const std::vector<std::shared_ptr<ResponseHandler>> &handlers
)

Add a StoryPoint by using its parameters.

Parameters

const std::string&

See StoryPoint

text
const std::string&

See StoryPoint

parser
TextParser*

See StoryPoint

handlers
const std::vector<std::shared_ptr<ResponseHandler>>&

See StoryPoint

Next
void Next()

Advances to the next point in the story.

Note: If it's already at the end of the branch, it does nothing.

Prev
void Prev()

Reverses to the previous point in the story.

Note: If it's at the beginning of the branch, it does nothing.

Head
int Head()

Returns the position of the head, 0 is at the start.

IsAtStart
bool IsAtStart()

Returns true, if at the beginning of the branch.

IsAtEnd
bool IsAtEnd()

Returns true, if at the end of the branch.

SetHead
void SetHead(
unsigned int index
)

Moves the head to a certain point in the story line.

Parameters
index
unsigned int

The index of the point in the storyline.

SetHeadByName
void SetHeadByName(
const std::string &name
)

Moves the head to a certain point in the story line by its name.  Does nothing if no story point with that name exists.

Parameters
name
const std::string&

The name of the story point

const StoryBranch &parent
)
Parameters

The StoryBranch which will become the parent

UnsetParentBranch
void UnsetParentBranch()

Makes the branch parentless.

GetName
std::string GetName() const
Returns

The name of the branch, "" if no name has been set

GetPointAt
StoryPoint* GetPointAt(
unsigned int index
) const
Parameters
index
unsigned int

The index of a point in the storyline.

Returns

A pointer to the StoryPoint at that index, nullpointer if it doesn't exist

GetHead
StoryPoint* GetHead() const

Returns the current StoryPoint.

Returns

A pointer to the StoryPoint, nullpointer if the branch is empty.

Returns

A pointer to the parent branch.

Length
size_t Length() const
Returns

The number of story points in this branch

Empty
bool Empty() const
Returns

True if the Length of this branch is 0
